metadata.title: Best Restream Alternatives 2025: Multistreaming Platform Comparison
metadata.description: Top Restream alternatives for YouTube multistreaming. Compare streaming platforms.

hero.headline: Best Restream Alternatives 2025
hero.subheadline: Multistream to YouTube and beyond. Options compared.

sections.content: Restream is popular for broadcasting to multiple platforms simultaneously, but it's not the only option. Whether you want lower cost, different features, or just alternatives—here are the best options for multistreaming your YouTube content.

content.title: OBS + Plugins
content.description: Free multistreaming with plugins. Full control, more setup.

content.title: StreamYard
content.description: Better guest management. Fewer platforms but easier use.

content.title: Castr
content.description: Similar to Restream. Different pricing structure.

content.title: OBS + obs-multi-rtmp
content.description: Plugin for OBS. Free, requires technical setup.

content.title: Own Server + nginx
content.description: Technical but free. Full control over streams.

content.title: YouTube Native
content.description: Stream to YouTube only, simulcast with RTMP key to others.

faq.question: Can I multistream for free?
faq.answer: Yes—OBS with multi-rtmp plugin works well. Requires more technical setup. Prism has limited free tier. True free options exist.

faq.question: Is StreamYard better than Restream?
faq.answer: Different focus. StreamYard better for guests and production. Restream better for pure multistreaming to many platforms. Depends on needs.

faq.question: What about just streaming to YouTube?
faq.answer: YouTube alone is fine for most creators. Multistreaming spreads audience thin. Consider: is multistreaming necessary for your goals?

faq.question: Best for multistreaming with guests?
faq.answer: StreamYard or Riverside for guests. Restream's guest features are basic. If interviews are priority, guest-focused platforms work better.
